TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompensationToken extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a means to explicitly confirm or compensate a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> once the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> has successfully completed.
